ai-patthana8.10:0.2_0: (This should be expanded in line with the teaching.)
ai-patthana8.10:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the arising of views.
ai-patthana8.10:1.1_1: There is no cause or condition for the arising of views.
ai-patthana8.10:1.1_2: causes and conditions for the cause and reason.
ai-patthana8.10:2.1_0: Neither gives rise to diversity of principles. ...
ai-patthana8.10:3.1_0: if there are no coming into houses, but not the teaching of the household life, and that gives rise to the causes.
ai-patthana8.10:4.1_0: nine based on what is the reason for convictions.
ai-patthana8.10:6.1_0: Though it’s not the cause or condition for the teaching.
ai-patthana8.10:6.1_1: Thoughts are not the cause or condition for the teaching.
ai-patthana8.10:6.1_2: They don’t memorize the teaching for the Teaching and the Monastic Law.
ai-patthana8.10:7.1_0: for the instruction, but not the reason for the teaching.
ai-patthana8.10:7.1_1: They don’t memorize the teachings of the teachings, for them.
ai-patthana8.10:8.1_0: The cause, based on the three supports, and the four kinds of textual analysis are the meaning.
ai-patthana8.10:8.1_1: They go to see ninety supports, and to each other. And two, three, four, five, ten, twenty, thirty, forty,
